title: Teacher Professional Development Program Based on Classroom Research

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogical knowledge and science subject content knowledge
context.additional_context: Online-based program where pre-service teachers form teams with experienced teachers (chemistry/multidisciplinary fields) to iteratively perform lesson study cycles

learning_goals: Preservice and in-service teachers collaboratively enhance Pedagogical Content Knowledge (PCK) by over 20% during the lesson design and implementation process
Successfully conduct student-centered lesson design at least three times through the lesson study cycle (development-execution-reflection phases)
Derive and apply at least five lesson improvement strategies through collaborative reflection with peer teachers
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
